Text: Welcome to Media TrecPST Dear Dutch Quigley As a valued member of the Premium Offers network you are already receiving special offers We are pleased to introduce ourselves as the newest partner to the Premium Offers network As the leading source of unique oneofakind promotions Media Trec has established relationships with some of the nations largest companies therein affording you opportunity to take advantage of promotional offers that include valuable discounts bargains special offers sweepstakes entertainment travel and financial opportunities on the Internet In our continuing effort to maintain the best relationship with you our client we realize that you may not be interested in receiving our offers While we will be sorry to see you go we also value your perception of us Accordingly although you always have the opportunity to cancel your subscription at any time if you would prefer not to receive our special offers please click the unsubscribe link below Thank you for all of your support and we look forward to bringing you only the best special offers and fantastic values in the coming year Kind regards The Media Trec Family
